mng: foot, leg (of an animal or an object), base (of an object), classifier for kicks

exm.mng: to stay for a time, to stop over, to lodge, to sink down (into soft ground), left-overs
background (one's origin), role (esp in Chinese opera)
to have one's feet firmly planted on the ground (idiom); realistic without flights of fancy, steady and serious character
legs and feet, ability to walk, strides
